short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the speed display on D&DBeyond to show a number of 5ft squares.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: While using the character app in D&D Beyond, your speed is displayed in feet. In the game's official rules, it is recommended that players who play on a grid note their speed as a number of 5-foot squares instead. You cannot do that on D&D Beyond, but this extension does it for you. As long as it is enabled, this extension will convert your movement speed from feet to squares.
